options.name: Melodic Conduit
options.description: You can use a Musical Instrument as a Conduit, allowing you to play Magical Ballads and Channel Spells. You gain the ability to play Magical Ballads which require an Action to start and your Focus to maintain which affect anyone within 4 Units who can hear. Learn 1 Magical Ballad of your choice.

options.name: Enhanced Ballads
options.description: The Range on your Ballads is increased by 2

options.name: New Composition
options.description: Learn a Magical Ballad and gain +1 Concentration

options.name: Action : Improvise
options.description: You use your Melodic Conduit to Channel a Beginner or Novice Spell that requires your Focus without spending any Power or requiring you to be able to speak.

options.name: Free Action : Powerchord
options.description: If you are currently Focusing on playing a Ballad, you play a powerful note on your instrument, causing the next Spell you complete Channeling on this turn to be Charged.

options.name: The Magic of Music
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage, +1 Spell Attack and learn a Magical Ballad
